lessons.text: Access Key + Secret Key stored at `/root/.config/kling-ai/credentials.json`
This is the key to the AI influencer video pipeline - Kling can generate video from API
No browser automation needed - direct API access
API requires separate purchased credits (subscription credits = web UI only)
Subscription: Creator Plan, 5150/6000 credits, renews March 1
- Key lesson: Ship what works, don't spend hours fighting browser automation
